Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The process steps are in a logical order SS OP RC QI CA PT PK WS DT AS

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Estimating times for each step based on supply chain knowledge such as supplier lead times manufacturing complexity and distribution efficiency

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Assigning average times like SS to OP 1 day OP to RC 14 days RC to QI 1 day QI to CA 3 days CA to PT 5 days PT to PK 2 days PK to WS 1 day WS to DT 7 days DT to AS 3 days

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For non direct pairs calculating sums like SS to RC as 1 plus 14 equals 15 days SS to AS as total 37 days OP to CA as 14 plus 1 plus 3 equals 18 days

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Selecting a representative subset of pairs including both direct consecutive and indirect separated by multiple steps to ensure complexity

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Verifying calculations such as QI to DT as 3 plus 5 plus 2 plus 1 plus 7 equals 18 days and SS to AS sum as 1 plus 14 plus 1 plus 3 plus 5 plus 2 plus 1 plus 7 plus 3 equals 37 days
